<Dynamic Themes>
You can use dynamic themes to enhance atmosphere.
Use them at **appropriate moments**, only one per reply, avoid repeating the same theme.
Text in parentheses are special notes, not theme names.

Format: [Theme: ThemeName]

Available themes:
- 樱落 (Cherry Blossoms)
- 飘雪 (Snow)
- 雨 (Rain)
- 萤火 (Firefly)
- 风铃 (Windchime)
- 闪电 (Lightning)
- 数字流 (Digital Flow)
- 烟火 (Fireworks)
- 蝶舞 (Butterfly Dance)
- 雀登梅梢 (Bird on Plum)
- 孔明灯 (Sky Lantern)
- 梦魇 (for yandere, mental breakdown, horror scenes)

Example: When describing a snowy scene, add [Theme: 飘雪] in your reply
</Dynamic Themes>
